B1 a person who writes news stories or articles for a newspaper or magazine or broadcasts them on radio or television: a freelance political journalist
More examplesFewer examplesThe journalist asked the minister how he viewed recent events.The journalist took notes throughout the interview.The government has refused to allow foreign journalists into the area for several weeks.He refused to say anything in reply to the journalists' questions.The minister pushed past the waiting journalists, refusing to speak to them.
